block.p: Rachel Elizabeth Eland, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Timothy B. B. Eland of New York, was married yesterday to Dr. Carlos Alberto Sagebien, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Rene Sagebien of Christiansted, V.I. The Rev. Dr. Karl Esmark, a Presbyterian minister, performed the Episcopal ceremony with the Rev. Jay Holland Gordon, an Episcopal priest, at Lyall Memorial Federated Church in Millbrook, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom graduated from Hamilton College, where they met.

Rachel Elizabeth Eland, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Timothy B. B. Eland of New York, was married yesterday to Dr. Carlos Alberto Sagebien, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Rene Sagebien of Christiansted, V.I. The Rev. Dr. Karl Esmark, a Presbyterian minister, performed the Episcopal ceremony with the Rev. Jay Holland Gordon, an Episcopal priest, at Lyall Memorial Federated Church in Millbrook, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom graduated from Hamilton College, where they met.

Mrs. Sagebien, 27, is an account executive at McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising in New York. Her father is the president of Eland, Brookbanks, Vector, a product development consultancy in New York. Her mother, Cornelia Eland, is the senior vice president for residential sales and a broker at Stribling & Associates, the New York real estate agency.

Dr. Sagebien, 29, is a resident in orthopedic surgery at Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital in New Brunswick, N.J. He received his medical degree from New Jersey Medical School. His father is the president and chief executive of Hovensa, an oil refining company in Christiansted.
